title.narrative: OUTPUT 2: COMMUNICATION

description.narrative: Communication support for UNICEF programmes, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6: Cross-Sectoral on for multiple sectoral outcomes.
